data.title: Perfect stop prior to the game or show.
data.text: Ideally located so as to be a good stop prior to (or after) a show/concert or hockey game at the Santander arena. The food is quite good (I recommend the Rachel) and the prices reasonable. Sald bar and 2nd story view over the bustle below. The only drawback is that when busy, the service is tight - but still good.

data.title: Simple and easy
data.text:
Have been here a few times. Average food and service. Not bad. Simple and easy. The food is average and nothing is a must. Good place for a quick bite. 

$

data.title: Business Lunch
data.text: I was meeting a CEO for a business lunch to discuss expansion.  I found this place a nice place to meet but not the kind of place to discuss business ideas.  Lunch of ok, service was good, price was a bit high for this kind of establishment.

data.title: Okay food, slower service
data.text:
Have eaten a couple of dozen times over the last 10 years.  The food is okay, nothing terribly fancy or terribly tasty.

The salad bar is lacking and the lettuce and other leaf vegetables are not very fresh.  The soups are not very flavorful and if you do not get in when the soups have just been replenished, you may only get broth.

Of the side fries, the batter-fried are the best.

data.title: Business peoples restaurant
data.text: I have been here on a few occasions and the best way to describe it, as i can, is to say its a place for all the the business men/women to eat during the day.  The food and drinks are pricey and you kind of feel out of place.  It is in such a great location, as far as Reading is concerned, being up on the second floor overlooking the town square and such but doesn't seem to be doing much with the space.  The last i checked it wasn't often open late but it IS on SOME occasions.  If you are somewhat upper class tho, going to the Sovereign Center or some other event in Reading and its open you may like it.

data.title: Boring
data.text: I figured this would be filled with entertainment and people after dark since it is right by the arena. I was so bored. Bartender was unpleasant too.
